name: Casino Crush Puzzle
description:
The power of magic casino jewels crush is in your hands! Switch and match 3 or more casino jewels to complete many casino items in time.

Casino Crush Blast Mania is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colourful casino gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles! With candy style jewels to eliminate in time, Casino Crush Blast Mania is twice the fun but familiar to play. So let's get started now!

Game Features:
- Single Player: challenging to make many $$$ amount with 1 minute.
- Multi Player: Race with your friend network.
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface

How to Play:
- Swap the casino jewels to match 3 in a line to remove them
- Match as fast as you can within 60 seconds
